event.title: was formed from the Town of Wayne in 1806

data.event: The town was formed from the Town of Wayne in 1806 while still part of Steuben County.

event.title: Steuben County's contribution to the newly formed Schuyler County in 1854

data.event: Reading became part of Steuben County's contribution to the newly formed Schuyler County in 1854.
